name.description: Identifies the name of the cinema

GeoCoordinates.description: Coordinates of the location in EPSG 4326 projection standard

city.description: Identifies in term of cites the position of the cinema

housenumber.description: Identifies the hosenumber of the cinema

postal_code.description: Identifies the postcode of the cites where the cinema is located

address.description: Identifies the street name where the cinema is located
